rows.label: qst201004_msg0001
rows.name:
I see... So the culprits were
indeed a pair of Blades.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0002
rows.name:
How much information does the
Security Department have?

rows.label: qst201004_msg1001
rows.name:
Honestly, aside from the fact that
the two Blades are named Mikumari
and Seori, we know almost nothing.

rows.label: qst201004_msg2001
rows.name:
We are currently searching for
those two Blades and the Driver
who controls them, but...

rows.label: qst201004_msg3001
rows.name:
We haven't even found anyone who
has witnessed their Driver.

rows.label: qst201004_msg3002
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201004_msg4001
rows.name:
I heard that the same incidents
are happening in other countries.
Are they all their doing?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0003
rows.name: It is highly likely.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0004
rows.name:
A similar incident occurred in
Gula recently, and we were finally
able to confirm their presence.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0005
rows.name:
However, several of our soldiers
have already been sacrificed...

rows.label: qst201004_msg0006
rows.name:
If the army is involved,
why not mobilize more
troops and capture them?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0007
rows.name:
No, it's just that... with only two
Blades as opponents, we can't mobilize
the Capital Standing Army...

rows.label: qst201004_msg0009
rows.name:
And yet, with only the personnel of
our Security Department, we can't
conduct a large-scale operation.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0012
rows.name:
But we cannot just leave
the situation as it is.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0013
rows.name:
How about this? Could we also
cooperate in capturing the culprits?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0014
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst201004_msg0015
rows.name:
If we could have the cooperation
of the Special Inquisitor, it
would be very reassuring!

rows.label: qst201004_msg0016
rows.name:
Cooperating is fine, but I wonder
how we should capture them.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0017
rows.name:
Shall we just wander around the
city with Core Crystals again?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0018
rows.name:
They might be wary this time, but
with about 100, they might attack.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0019
rows.name:
Against those two, we'll
have to be prepared for
some damage on our side...

rows.label: qst201004_msg0020
rows.name:
There is no need to move
according to the opponent's
mood or convenience.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0021
rows.name: Do you have a good idea, Meleph?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0022
rows.name:
Instead of waiting for the opponent to
make a move, we should drag them into a
situation that is advantageous for us.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0024
rows.name:
If we combine our forces with the
Security Department, we can gather
a considerable number...

rows.label: qst201004_msg0025
rows.name:
If we divide the capture unit into two, us and the
Security Department, and face them one by one
instead of both at once, we can minimize damage.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0027
rows.name: But how do we lure them out one by one?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0028
rows.name: We spread a rumor.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0029
rows.name: A rumor?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0030
rows.name:
A rumor that a transaction of
smuggled Core Crystals will
take place in two locations.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0031
rows.name:
If we secretly spread this
among merchants and it spreads
well throughout the city...

rows.label: qst201004_msg0032
rows.name:
The culprits will take the
bait and come after it.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0033
rows.name:
If we use the Mercenary Group to spread
the rumor, we should be able to do it
without the opponent noticing.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0034
rows.name:
But even if we face them one by
one, they're quite skilled, right?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0035
rows.name:
We'll be fine, but can
the Security Department
guys capture them alone?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0036
rows.name:
If their forces are insufficient, we
can dispatch our Mercenary Group for
support when the operation begins.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0037
rows.name:
If the Security Department
is fine with that, shall
we go with that plan?

rows.label: qst201004_msg0038
rows.name: Yes, no problem!

rows.label: qst201004_msg0039
rows.name:
Then we will organize a capture unit
and proceed with preparations.

rows.label: qst201004_msg0040
rows.name: Alright, everyone, begin the operation!
